00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Drawing;
00025 using Utilities.Media.Image.Procedural;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.Media.Image
00029 {
00033     public class OilPainting:IDisposable
00034     {
00035         public OilPainting(Bitmap Image,int Seed,int NumberOfPoints)
00036         {
00037             _Image = new Bitmap(Image);
00038             _NumberOfPoints = NumberOfPoints;
00039             Map = new CellularMap(Seed, Image.Width, Image.Height, NumberOfPoints);
00040             SetupImage();
00041         }
00042 
00043         private void SetupImage()
00044         {
00045             for (int i = 0; i < _NumberOfPoints; ++i)
00046             {
00047                 int Red=0;
00048                 int Green=0;
00049                 int Blue=0;
00050                 int Counter=0;
00051                 for (int x = 0; x < _Image.Width; ++x)
00052                 {
00053                     for (int y = 0; y < _Image.Height; ++y)
00054                     {
00055                         if (Map.ClosestPoint[x, y] == i)
00056                         {
00057                             Color Pixel = _Image.GetPixel(x, y);
00058                             Red += Pixel.R;
00059                             Green += Pixel.G;
00060                             Blue += Pixel.B;
00061                             ++Counter;
00062                         }
00063                     }
00064                 }
00065                 int Counter2 = 0;
00066                 for (int x = 0; x < _Image.Width; ++x)
00067                 {
00068                     for (int y = 0; y < _Image.Height; ++y)
00069                     {
00070                         if (Map.ClosestPoint[x, y] == i)
00071                         {
00072                             _Image.SetPixel(x, y, Color.FromArgb(Red / Counter, Green / Counter, Blue / Counter));
00073                             ++Counter2;
00074                             if (Counter2 == Counter)
00075                                 break;
00076                         }
00077                     }
00078                     if (Counter2 == Counter)
00079                         break;
00080                 }
00081             }
00082         }
00083 
00084         private CellularMap Map = null;
00085         public Bitmap _Image { get; set; }
00086         private int _NumberOfPoints = 0;
00087 
00088         #region IDisposable Members
00089 
00090         public void Dispose()
00091         {
00092             if (_Image != null)
00093             {
00094                 _Image.Dispose();
00095                 _Image = null;
00096             }
00097         }
00098 
00099         #endregion
00100     }
00101 }
